column4: personally on my vps, I run everything over vpn and have iptables setup with just that 1 port, and the rest only available to vpn clients.  personal use swerver.
if yours is a bit more open, then iptables for only those ports you need, drop everything else, and fail2ban is also a good idea.
that's exactly what I'm doing. I'm mostly worried about web app vulnerabilities.
